Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits consumer contract provisions waiving the consumer's right to make statements concerning goods or services
Summary: Relates to prohibiting consumer contract provisions waiving the consumer's right to make statements concerning goods or services.
LawCode: Add ยง398-g, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting consumer contract provisions waiving the consumer's right to make statements concerning goods or services
